tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geolocation_info (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  advertiser_name VARCHAR(255),
  budget DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                           campaign_name VARCHAR,
                           campaign_start_date DATE,
                           campaign_end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                            location_name VARCHAR,
                            latitude DECIMAL,
                            longitude DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE Ads (ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                       ad_name VARCHAR,
                       ad_image_url VARCHAR,
                       ad_clicks INT,
                       location_id INT,
                       FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id));

CREATE TABLE location_data ( 
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    latitude FLOAT, 
    longitude FLOAT, 
    address TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns ( 
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    location_id UUID REFERENCES location_data(location_id), 
    start_date TIMESTAMP, 
    end_date TIMESTAMP, 
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2) 
)

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions ( 
    impression_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    campaign_id UUID REFERENCES ad_campaigns(campaign_id), 
    impression_time TIMESTAMP, 
    user_id UUID, 
    device_id UUID 
)

CREATE TABLE user_data ( 
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    email VARCHAR(255), 
    phone_number VARCHAR(15), 
    gender VARCHAR(10) 
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE advertisers (
    advertiser_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    advertiser_name VARCHAR,
    contact_email TEXT,
    phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ads (
    ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR,
    ad_content TEXT,
    ad_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaign_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id UUID,
    campaign_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES ads(ad_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
)
